message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $850,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $775,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  While $775,000 is closer, I can't go that low. My final offer is $810,000.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $805,000. I'm willing to meet you at this point, but I need to get as close to my budget as possible.
